title: WHOOPS. Something Broke
body:
Hi.
I have problem with download LoL. I get ERROR Whooops. Something broke. Plz help me.
Thx :3

replies.body:
Bug splats like that are most often caused by some weird driver or hardware interactions. I'd suggest going over the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to make sure we cover the most common solutions.

Hit me back up if you're still having problems getting that downloaded!
